name: Day Before The Slay
description:
Short horror game where you go back in time to solve a murder of a citizen. Oct 24, 2003. You're given access to the houses of three suspects. It's your task to collect proof and find the murderer.

This game was originally made for the Brackeys game jam 2020.2 (August). The game was nowhere close to playable at the time of the deadline, so it wasn't submitted.  After some bug fixing and polish, it's overall not a terrible game though so why not publish it? Yes, a year later. Enjoy our second game; have fun!
